faqs.q: How many calories in 8 ounces of cooked steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 454 kcal for lean sirloin, broiled without added fat.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in 8 oz steak?
faqs.a: About 61 g of protein, making it a high-protein option.

faqs.q: Does steak have carbs or fiber?
faqs.a: Zero carbs and zero fiber in plain cooked steak.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in steak?
faqs.a: Grilling or broiling keeps calories lower; frying with oil adds 40+ kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: What about calories in different steak cuts?
faqs.a: Sirloin: ~200 kcal/100 g; ribeye: ~300 kcal/100 g due to more fat.
